Posts.Content: Mags - wish you and your mum the best of luck. Also going through same. they gave my mum a provisional grade before operation and a final grade afterwards. They didnt ever provide a stage. Try not to get too fixated on stages/grades - I did and I have now just tried to move away from it as much as my brain will allow. hope your mum gets well soon
Posts.Title: Stage after chemo?
